ComicInfo.Summary:
Becky has the chance to ask her "Pa" all the questions she needs to about the sixth gun, but does she receive the answers she seeks? Meanwhile, Gord Cantrell's past is further explored in the abandoned rooms of the plantation estate. A little more light is shed on his stoic and cautious nature and it appears to be connected to General Hume's indoctrination into strange magics in a gruesome manner.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-06 18:50:50. [CVDB301067]
